QuestData.Title: Impending Retribution
QuestData.Description: Now that you've been suitably rewarded, I hope I can speak with you frankly.$B$BYou've done my kingdom a great favor, but you've also unbalanced a fragile peace process.$B$BI was pursuing my brother's release strictly through diplomatic means in order to avoid bloodshed.$B$BNow, the enemy is sure to seek retaliation.$B$BSpeak to Nomarch Teneth at the Tahret Grounds to the east, Sun Priest Asaris at the Seal of the Sun King to the north and Asaq at Mar'at to the west. Find out where the enemy will strike.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Nomarch Teneth at the Tahret Grounds, Sun Priest Asaris at the Seal of the Sun King, and Asaq at Mar'at.
QuestData.CompletionText: You've returned, $n. Have you completed the task I request of you?
QuestData.RewardText: Orsis! Of course!$B$BHow could I not have seen this?
